ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Shockwave: Shockwave spun, avoiding optic lasers.  Pitiful, illogical Autobot.  You attack a superior unit.  It is illogical and will be your downfall.

Shockwave:



Shockwave spun, avoiding optic lasers.  "Pitiful, illogical Autobot.  You 
attack a superior unit.  It is illogical and will be your downfall." 
Shockwave commented, bringing up the targeting scanners, firing two missiles 
down at Cyber Claw, Shockwave in his space fighter mode.
